title: Python Performance Profiling: The Guts And The Glory
description:
Your Python program is too slow, and you need to optimize it. Where do
you start? With the right tools, you can optimize your code where it
counts. We’ll explore the guts of the Python profiler “Yappi” to
understand its features and limitations. We’ll learn how to find the
maximum performance wins with minimum effort.
quality_notes: Partial tutorial, due to a technical error only the beginning of the speak was recorded, sorry for the inconvenience.
